title: Contextualized Instructional Design-Based Project Learning for HPV Vaccine Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Life Science and Public Health Knowledge
context.additional_context: In-service elementary teachers develop and validate HPV vaccine educational materials, producing digital/print resources using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the mechanism of the HPV vaccine and the diseases it prevents.
Learners can develop content and design for HPV vaccine educational materials for elementary students following expert validation procedures.
Learners can effectively utilize digital and print educational materials in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
